post_text:
I decided to alter the cover of the binder that houses my weekly organizer. With a few rub-ons and one of my favorite Cosmo Cricket papers, it now looks like this:
It is something that I open and refer to every single day and now reaching for it just makes me smile. If your organizer is still plain, you might just consider doing the same.
